author.name: Anthony
author.description: Web developer, author and online course instructor with Vue.js Developers

description: In this tutorial, I'll show you how to set up a full-stack VueJS/Laravel app and demo each of the CRUD operations. We'll use Axios for AJAX, and I'll also show you strategies for dealing with the tricky UX of this architecture.
name: The Ultimate Vue.js & Laravel CRUD Tutorial
